dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Welcome to the world of Eridoria. I'm a brave adventurer seeking fortune and glory.

dialogues.speaker: Goblin Leader
dialogues.text: Foolish mortal! You'll never leave this cave alive!

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Oh, I've fought goblins before. Bring it on!

dialogues.speaker: Goblin Leader
dialogues.text: You may have fought goblins before, but you'll never defeat me and my army of razor-toothed minions!
